sentences.en: ...damage to the muscles and internal organs.
sentences.cn: …对肌肉和内脏的损伤。

sentences.en: A barrel - organ was wheezing out an old tune.
sentences.cn: 一架手摇风琴正在呼哧呼哧地奏着一首古老的曲子.

sentences.en: A pipe organ gives much more volume than a violin or flute.
sentences.cn: 管风琴发出的音量比小提琴或笛子都大.

sentences.en: Animal rights activists oppose using any mammal as an organ factory.
sentences.cn: 动物权力保护分子反对用任何哺乳动物作为器官工厂.

sentences.en: Doris played a few simple melodies on an ancient organ.
sentences.cn: 桃丽丝弹古老的风琴,奏了几首简单的曲子.

sentences.en: dying people who have agreed to be organ donors
sentences.cn: 愿意捐献器官的垂死的病人

sentences.en: Extra doses of the hormone caused the animals’ reproductive organs to develop sooner than usual.
sentences.cn: 额外使用激素使得这些动物的生殖器官比正常情况下发育得更快。

sentences.en: He ground out a tune on an organ.
sentences.cn: 他用风琴弹奏一支曲子.

sentences.en: He playea quite well on the mouth - organ.
sentences.cn: 他口琴吹得很好.

sentences.en: He played a beautiful tune on the organ.
sentences.cn: 他用风琴演奏出一支动听的曲子.

sentences.en: He taught the piano, organ and composition.
sentences.cn: 他教授钢琴、管风琴和作曲。

sentences.en: In Arizona, 480 people are waiting for organ transplants.
sentences.cn: 亚利桑那州有480人在等待器官移植。

sentences.en: loss of blood flow to his vital organs
sentences.cn: 他的生命器官供血不足

sentences.en: Most marine gastropod mollusks develop a ciliate swimming organ  in certain larval stages.
sentences.cn: 大多数海洋腹足纲软体动物在某些幼体阶段形成一种有纤毛的游泳器官。

sentences.en: the decision-making organs
sentences.cn: 决策机关

sentences.en: The heart is a highly contractile organ.
sentences.cn: 心脏是具有高度收缩性的器官.

sentences.en: The largest organ in the body is the liver.
sentences.cn: 人体最大的器官是肝脏。

sentences.en: the liver, heart, and other internal organs
sentences.cn: 肝脏、心脏及其他内脏器官

sentences.en: The patient'simmune system would reject the transplanted organ as a foreign object.
sentences.cn: 病人的免疫系统会对移植器官产生异质排斥反应。

sentences.en: The timbre of the violin is far richer than that of the mouth organ.
sentences.cn: 小提琴的音色远比口琴丰富。

sentences.en: We ended with Blake's Jerusalem, accompanied on the organ by Herbert Wiseman.
sentences.cn: 在赫伯特·怀斯曼的风琴伴奏下，我们演唱了布莱克的《耶路撒冷》作为终曲。

sentences.en: When they saw the elephant blowing the mouth organ , the children roared with laughter.
sentences.cn: 看见大象吹口琴, 孩子们这个乐啊!

words.tran_cn: [有化] 有机的；组织的；器官的；根本的
有组织的；组织起来的（等于organized）
有机地；有组织地；器官上地
有机体说；唯器官变化论
组织（等于organize）；有机化；给予生机
组织；使有系统化；给予生机；组织成立工会等

phrases.tran_cn: 人工器官；人造脏器；人工瀑
感觉器官；感觉器官；感觉瀑

trans.tran_en: a part of the body, such as the heart or lungs, that has a particular purpose
